cause.description:
After I learned my freind was afflicted with TBS, the burden was passed onto me and so many countless other families to put at an end this most heanus of deseases. I ask you, with your donation of only $1 a month, indefinatley, bring salvation to the afflicted. Save a TBS victem. Do the right thing.
~Jake Martin, Founder
1. TBS must be stopped.
2. Those who cannot be helped must be comforted.
3. Tom Bosley must be found at all costs.
cause.mission: Find Tom Bosley and keep him under surveilence to make sure we know where he is at all times.
cause.name: Stop TBS (Tom Bosley sighting syndrone) before its too late.
